titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Association of Community Organizations for Reform Now (ACORN) should lose its exemption from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 9/29/2009--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the Association of Community Organizations for Reform Now (ACORN) should lose its tax-exempt status.
